702951f-a.text:
Adelphi Street, north from (No. 91) a point midway between Myrtle and Park Avenues. At Park Avenue, on the east side of the street (right), is the Roman Catholic Sacred Hearts Church.
October 10, 1940
P. L. Sperr
(2)
The Sacred Hearts Church, near the N. E. corner of Park Avenue.
October 10, 1940
P. L. Sperr
702951f-a.folder: Adelphi Street & Myrtle Avenue, Brooklyn, NY

702951f-b.folder: Adelphi Street & Myrtle Avenue, Brooklyn, NY

702958f-b.text:
Adelphi Street, east side, north from Myrtle Avenue, showing a continuous view in a set of three photographs. On the left, with
flag hanging therefrom, is Public School No. 12.
View 2 shows the school and two very old frame houses. View 3
is north from the school.
October 10, 1940
Views 1,2,3
P. L. Sperr
702958f-b.folder: Adelphi Street & Myrtle Avenue, Brooklyn, NY
